Global css manual

Welcome on SOJUZ Global CSS manual.

The documentation consists of a list of topics like aligments or background collors. All topics contain a collection of css files that you can easily compose to change. A single collection consists of a description of atomic css classes with examples



Atom example

Atom, is reusable css class, coud added to all components, for example: 
{}

.has-default-background-color

.has-default-background-color atomic class set default backgrond color, chosse in one of many backgroundcolors collections

 





Modifier exerption example

Modifier extended custom parent element for atom display options: 
.has-white-background-color{
  background-color: #ffffff
}
